channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ABC Pays the Price for George Stephanopoulos’s Partisan Irresponsibility
item.description: The fickle gods of irony are at work on this one.

item.title: How Team Trump Turned The RNC Into A Get-Out-The-Vote Machine
item.description: The party needed significant reform after having to pick up the pieces from the dismal tenure of Ronna Romney McDaniel.

item.title: The NFL’s Streaming Scheme Makes Watching Football Insufferable And Nearly Impossible
item.description: The NFL sold out to streaming. Now loyal league fans are literally paying the price.

item.title: How Linda McMahon Can Punish Columbia for Its College-Rankings Scandal
item.description: McMahon will have the tools to restore a small bit of integrity to elite higher education. It’s now her turn to use them.

item.title: And the Prize for the Worst Daniel Penny Coverage Goes to . . .

item.title: A Different Perspective on Christmas
item.description: The illustrator P. J. Lynch lends his skillful brush to extraordinary depictions of familiar stories.

item.title: Mayorkas says DHS, FBI 'vigilant' in investigating drones
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas said the drone sightings are still being heavily investigated.

item.title: GOP Sen. Markwayne Mullin Decries Social Media For Giving Americans Insight Into Congress’s Backdoor Dealmaking
item.description: The Sooner State Republican decried how social media has hampered lawmakers' ability to negotiate on legislation behind closed doors.

item.title: By Bowing To The Leftist Mob, Caitlin Clark Abandons Her Most Ardent Defenders
item.description: What Clark fails to realize is that the leftists she's trying to appease will never embrace her.

item.title: Trump adviser Alex Bruesewitz collapses on stage during speech at New York Young Republican Club gala
item.description: An adviser to President-elect Trump's campaign, Alex Bruesewitz, fainted as he was speaking during a New York Young Republican Club gala Sunday night.
